description: This file is a source file for a utility that finds a child process pid given a parent pid and a process name. It defines the main function, a helper function handleFindPid, includes headers, and uses system calls such as usleep and fprintf.

methods.name: handleFindPid
methods.description: Finds a child process pid given a parent pid, process name, and timeout, with retries and logging.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the program that parses command line arguments, invokes handleFindPid, and outputs the result.
